velor_rocksdb_properties{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", property_name="velor_rocksdb_total-sst-files-size", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name="$cf_name"}

velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", type="new_state_leaves"} - ignoring(type) velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_leaves"}

velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", type="new_state_nodes"} - ignoring(type) velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_nodes"} - ignoring(type) velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="new_state_leaves"} + ignoring(type) velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_leaves"}

panels.title: Number of Accounts vs Internal Nodes

panels.description: On the version that wraps up an epoch, the "next block epoch" is the current epoch plus one.

targets.expr: velor_storage_next_block_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Next Block Epoch

targets.expr: velor_rocksdb_properties{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", property_name="velor_rocksdb_total-sst-files-size", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name="jellyfish_merkle_node"}

rate(velor_schemadb_put_bytes_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", cf_name="jellyfish_merkle_node"}[10m]) / rate(velor_schemadb_put_bytes_count[10m]) * ignoring(cf_name) ((velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="new_state_nodes"} - ignoring(type) velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_nodes"}) + 1000000 * (log2(velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="new_state_leaves"} - ignoring(type) velor_storage_ledger{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="stale_state_leaves"}) / 2 - 1))

panels.title: Jellyfish Tree Disk Size vs Calculated Size

avg by(cf_name)(irate(velor_schemadb_put_bytes_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m]) / irate(velor_schemadb_put_bytes_count[1m]))
